content.body: i forget, i know there was some syntax issues with using `:` in arg lists for named args, right?
content.formatted_body: i forget, i know there was some syntax issues with using : in arg lists for named args, right?

content.body:
Is there? `:` is only used in JS for:
- labeled statements
- case/default clauses
- property assignments in object literals/object patterns
- conditionals

I'm not aware of any other conflicts offhand.
content.formatted_body:
Is there? : is only used in JS for:

  • labeled statements
  • case/default clauses
  • property assignments in object literals/object patterns
  • conditionals

I'm not aware of any other conflicts offhand.
